rajadhi rawana - asura adhirajyaya wima wiru rawana - wirathwayen yuthu bawin thira rawana - sthira wu hangumen yuth rana rawana - ranakamithwayen hebi siri rawana - purusha lakshanayangen yuth tharu rawana - nakshatha්raya ha tharu palanaya puth rawana - pirimi daruwan sahitha manu rawana - maha sammathaya uruma wu dik rawana - thun lowa jayagath bawin raja rawana - dakshathawangen piri mewan wu dasha namayangen yuth maha raju nagi sita bhawana kirima udesa himalayata pitawi yayi.
